nodes.text: Rehmar Thul was a Human male member of House Thul living during the Cold War.

When House Ulgo took control over one of the Thul factories in Kaamos Territory, Rehmar Thul tasked an Imperial Hero to to plant his dataspikes in the factory computers in order to grant him access to internal systems and retake the factory using its own defenses and turning them against the Ulgos.
